member.name: FIXED_INFO
member.summary: TheFIXED_INFO structure contains information that is the same across all the interfaces on a computer.

member.name: FIXED_INFO.HostName
member.summary: The hostname for the local computer. This may be the fully qualified hostname (including the domain) for a computer that is joined to a domain.

member.name: FIXED_INFO.DomainName
member.summary: The domain in which the local computer is registered.

member.name: FIXED_INFO.CurrentDnsServer
member.summary: Reserved. Use the DnsServerList member to obtain the DNS servers for the local computer.

member.name: FIXED_INFO.DnsServerList
member.summary: A linked list of structures that specify the set of DNS servers used by the local computer.

summary.para: The node type of the local computer. These values are defined in theIptypes.h header file.

member.name: FIXED_INFO.EnableRouting
member.summary: A Boolean value that specifies whether routing is enabled on the local computer.

member.name: FIXED_INFO.EnableProxy
member.summary: A Boolean value that specifies whether the local computer is acting as an ARP proxy.

member.name: FIXED_INFO.EnableDns
member.summary: A Boolean value that specifies whether DNS is enabled on the local computer.
